body: Guardian writes that "A Twitter account believed to belong to Iran's supreme leader has triggered controversy among Iranians whose own access to social networking websites remains blocked."
original_body: Guardian writes that "A Twitter account believed to belong to Iran's supreme leader has triggered controversy among Iranians whose own access to social networking websites remains blocked."
title: Iran:"Supreme leader tweetings infuriate Iran's bloggers"
